text: us (pita) ne kahaah main kadaapi use tumhaare saath nahin bhejoonga, yahaan tak ki allaah ke naam par mujhe drdh vachan do ki use mere paas avashy laoge, parantu ye ki tumako gher liya[1] jaaye aur jab unhonne apana drdh vachan diya, to kaha, allaah hee tumhaaree baat (vachan) ka nireekshak hai
